## Austin in Tech

------------------------------------------------------------------------

-   Developed by: Jay Campanell
-   App: [Found Here](https://ptxaz6-jay-campanell.shinyapps.io/Austin_Tech/)

This app was created using the [Austin Chamber of Commerce's data](https://www.austinchamber.com/blog/06-08-2021-high-tech-industry#:~:text=Austin's%20high%20tech%20employment%20is,significantly%20over%20the%20long%20term.) to visualize Austin as a growing city in tech.
